alert.note: Alert for Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 8:24AM EDT until March 26 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... McDuffie County in east central Georgia... Columbia County in east central Georgia... Northwestern Richmond County in east central Georgia... * Until 900 AM EDT. * At 823 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warrenton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Fort Gordon, Martinez, Harlem, Appling, Riverwood, Thomson-McDuffie County Airport, Dearing, Liberty Park Community Center, Sweetwater Park, Arties Pond Public Fishing Area, McDuffie County Fire Department, Adamsville, Bath-Edie, Thomson Fire Department, McDuffie Regional Medical Center, White Oak Campground and Autney. This includes Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 167 and 194. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
